title: Thomson say Hey to Titanium Hooch Hardtail frame w/ customizable cockpit components
content:
Rolling out of the Thomson stable in Chattahoochee, North Georgia, is the new Titanium Hooch Hardtail MTB built around 27.5″ wheels. Dubbed their “hardcore Ti ripper”, the Hooch gets a progressive geometry aimed squarely at trail riding. Here are the details on geometry, sizing, frame specs, build options and pricing. Thomson Titanium Hooch Hardtail  The […]

The post Thomson say Hey to Titanium Hooch Hardtail frame w/ customizable cockpit components appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
